meta.title: Aboubakar Sidik Faha :: DevOps Consultant & Entrepreneur in Abidjan
meta.description: I'm Aboubakar Sidik Faha, an experienced DevOps consultant and entrepreneur based in Abidjan. I'll help you making your IT infrastructure more reliable, scalable and secure as well as your business more profitable.
